channel.title: Gavin MacLeod on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Gavin MacLeod on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Disability sports in Scotland and the Commonwealth Games 2014
item.description: MM - Michael McEwan GM - Gavin MacLeod MM We are here on Iriss.fm, with the Chief Executive of Scottish Disability Sports, Gavin MacLeod. Gavin, so just tell us a bit about Scottish Disability Sports and the work that you do. GM Thanks Michael, our job is really to create opportunities for people with a disability to participate in sport and then once we have got them involved in sport, is to develop their performance so that they can meet their full potential.
